faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.

items.a1: Botanical traceability is the process of tracking a plant or herb from its source of origin (the farm or forest) all the way to the final consumer product. This ensures authenticity, quality, and safety.
items.q2: Why is traceability important for Ayurvedic herbs?
items.a2: Many Ayurvedic herbs look similar and can be easily substituted or adulterated. Traceability guarantees you're getting the correct, potent herb, free from contaminants, and sourced ethically.
items.a3: We use a combination of DNA barcoding to genetically verify the plant species and geo-tagging to confirm its origin. Each batch is given a unique code that you can use to view its journey.
items.a4: We prioritize partnerships with farms that follow organic and sustainable practices. You can view the specific certifications for each herb on its traceability report.

howItWorks.title: Trace every step of your herbs — from farm to consumer — with complete transparency and trust.

kisanlogincard.title: Login with mobile number
kisanlogincard.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Try again later.

about.title: HerbLink
about.para:
HerbLink is an innovative blockchain-powered platform created to solve one of the most pressing challenges in the Ayurvedic industry—trust.
Today, consumers often face uncertainty when it comes to the authenticity, purity, and safety of herbal products.
Issues such as unverified sourcing, unsafe farming practices with hidden chemical usage, lack of lab-based quality data, and unreliable supply chains put both consumer health and the credibility of Ayurveda at risk.
Manufacturers, too, face difficulties in ensuring their herbs are genuinely pure and ethically sourced, leading to compromised products reaching the market.

HerbLink steps in as a complete traceability and transparency solution.
Every product integrated into our system comes with a unique QR code, which, when scanned, reveals the entire journey of the herb—from the farmer who cultivated it, to the lab where it was tested, to the manufacturer who prepared the final product.
This journey is not just a story, but a verified chain of data stored securely on a tamper-proof blockchain ledger.
This means no third party can manipulate or hide information, ensuring that consumers always receive reliable and truthful insights.

Beyond traceability, HerbLink ensures authentication at every stage of the process.
Farmers, labs, and manufacturers are verified through our authority-backed system, with additional support from SMS gateways to confirm authenticity.
This eliminates the risk of herbs being sourced from unreliable suppliers and guarantees that only verified, safe, and pure products reach the consumer.

Most importantly, HerbLink brings clarity and confidence to a space that desperately needs it.
By making the entire process transparent, we empower consumers to make informed health decisions while giving farmers and manufacturers a chance to build genuine credibility in the global market.
With HerbLink, Ayurveda can stay true to its roots of natural healing—restoring trust, safety, and purity in every herb that reaches your hands.

working.title: How HerbLink Works
working.subtitle: HerbLink ensures end-to-end transparency in the herbal supply chain — from farm to consumer. Each stage is tracked, verified, and stored on a blockchain ledger for trust and authenticity.

farmer.title: Farmer
farmer.description: Farmers register on the platform and receive a unique digital ID.
farmer.outcome: HerbLink generates a unique Asset ID / QR code for each batch, tagging the raw materials.

processor.title: Processor
processor.description: Farmers' batches are delivered to processors who scan the QR code to access farmer-submitted data.
processor.verificationIncorrect: If incorrect → batch is returned to the farmer
processor.outcome: All updates are stored on the blockchain ledger, linked to the same Asset ID.

laboratory.title: Laboratory
laboratory.description: Lab scientists scan the QR code to view farmer and processor records.
laboratory.outcome: These verified records are stored on the blockchain under the same Asset ID.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturers receive approved batches and verify farmer, processor, and lab records.
manufacturer.outcome: A new product-level QR code is generated, linking back to the original herb batch.

consumer.title: Consumer
consumer.description: Consumers scan the QR code on the final product using HerbLink.
consumer.outcome: This creates trust and transparency, strengthening consumer confidence in the product.

working.summaryText: Through this comprehensive 5-step process, HerbLink creates an unbreakable chain of trust from farm to consumer, ensuring every herbal product can be traced back to its origins with complete transparency and verification.
